name: Mega Fish Bingo - Free Bingo Los Vegas Bingo
name_original: Mega Fish Bingo - Free Bingo Los Vegas Bingo
description:
◆◆◆ Try your luck in Mega Fish Bingo !! ◆◆◆
Are you READYYYY? BINGO!!!
◆ CHALLENGE yourself and play up to 8 CARDS!
◆ UNLOCK new rooms and SECRET items as you play more and LEVEL UP!
It is no ordinary bingo game where you just daub all the way to a one bingo, in this bingo game you can use unique power-items like one, two free daubs, extra chips & coins, instant bingo and many more to maximize your score!
